title: Edge browser command line options like -fake webcam (inject/playback) like chrome provides for testing purposes for webrtc
body: See also https://blog.andyet.com/2014/09/29/testing-webrtc-applications/ which better explains the problem.

comments.body: See also https://blog.andyet.com/2014/09/29/testing-webrtc-applications/ which better explains the problem.
See as example https://webrtc.org/testing/. Something to avoid the need to grant camera or microphone permissions would make possible to test webrtc/ortc e.g. in BrowserStack.
